title: Nuveen New York AMT-Free Quality Municipal (NRK) Ex-Dividend Date Scheduled for September 12, 2019 - Nasdaq.com
text: Nuveen New York AMT-Free Quality Municipal ( NRK  ) will begin trading ex-dividend on September 12, 2019. A cash dividend payment of $0.045 per share is scheduled to be paid on October 01, 2019. Shareholders who purchased NRK prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment. This marks the 18th quarter that NRK has paid the same dividend. At the current stock price of $13.43, the dividend yield is 4.02%.
The previous trading day's last sale of NRK was $13.43, representing a -1.9% decrease from the 52 week high of $13.69 and a 16.99% increase over the 52 week low of $11.48.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the NRK Dividend History  page. Our  Dividend Calendar  has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
